laboratory_examinations.findings: Transaminases elevated at 393.0 IU/L (normal range 0.0 - 100.0 IU/L)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient had previous episodes of elevated transaminases that returned to normal.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Liver parenchyma unremarkable; common duct measuring 5 mm; stable peripheral left hepatic lesion with calcification; small gallbladder stones; pancreatic parenchyma normal; renal lesions noted with size changes: left largest measuring 8.4 x 9 cm, right lesion doubled to 14 x 18 x 18 mm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The largest lesion in the right kidney increased in size from 7 x 9 mm to 14 x 18 x 18 mm.
